mapper.sql: id, gkey, use_time, email, create_date, update_date,is_send_mail, context,context2
mapper.insert: insert into search_keys (id, gkey, use_time, email, create_date, update_date, context) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into search_keys
id,
gkey,

nickname,

mapper.update:
update search_keys
gkey = #{gkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_time = #{useTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
context = #{context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
context = #{context2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
is_send_mail = #{is_send_mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update search_keys set gkey = #{gkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_time = #{useTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, context = #{context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update search_keys set gkey = #{gkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_time = #{useTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from search_keys c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.gkey like concat ('%', #{gkey},'%')
and c.use_time like concat ('%', #{useTime},'%')
and c.email like concat ('%', #{email},'%')
and c.context like concat ('%', #{context},'%')
